dateplot1.title: H2 pump room
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_b312gasalarm WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="B312_gasalarm_H2_pumproom") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
dateplot1.ylabel: Gas level / % of low explosion level
